title: How PAMM Works?
subtitle: Simple to run. Built to scale.

cards.title: You trade a master account
cards.subtitle: Open a PAMM Manager Account on the Premier platform and execute your trading strategies.

cards.title: Investors allocate capital to you
cards.subtitle: Investors select your strategy and choose how much to allocate. Their funds stay in their own accounts, linked to your master account.

cards.title: Results and fees are automated
cards.subtitle: The system distributes trades, tracks investor performance, and calculates agreed performance fees at the end of each period.
